about_the_game:
Underling Uprising features modern Beat 'Em Up gameplay mixed with inspirations from nostalgic '90s cartoons. Fight across the world as the Underlings, a group of scientifically enhanced experiments, each with their own unique powers. You only have one mission at hand: Stop the mad scientist that created you!

Create new combos on the fly to juggle a variety of interactive and challenging enemies. Experiment with the open-ended combo system, there'll be plenty of room for optimizing! Once you have built enough meter, unleash powerful and flashy Supers!

Control a variety of strong Mounts to pummel your foes! These will range from spacepods, mech-suits, and more!

Learn each character's large moveset featuring mechanics such as Super Armor, Hovering, Animation Cancels, and Double Jumping! Each playthrough will be a unique experience that can always be further perfected!

On your quest for vengeance, you'll have to overcome Bosses and Mini-Bosses that will challenge your skills in different ways!

FEATURES

  • Up to 4-Player Local Co-Op and Versus Modes!

  • Explore 7 lengthy stages spanning the world (and even further)!

  • Face multiple difficulties for those seeking more challenge!

  • Beat your high score in Arcade Mode!

  • Pick up temporary weapons to spice up combat!

  • Easy to remember control scheme!

  • All characters can run, so you never feel slow!
detailed_description:
Underling Uprising features modern Beat 'Em Up gameplay mixed with inspirations from nostalgic '90s cartoons. Fight across the world as the Underlings, a group of scientifically enhanced experiments, each with their own unique powers. You only have one mission at hand: Stop the mad scientist that created you!

Create new combos on the fly to juggle a variety of interactive and challenging enemies. Experiment with the open-ended combo system, there'll be plenty of room for optimizing! Once you have built enough meter, unleash powerful and flashy Supers!

Control a variety of strong Mounts to pummel your foes! These will range from spacepods, mech-suits, and more!

Learn each character's large moveset featuring mechanics such as Super Armor, Hovering, Animation Cancels, and Double Jumping! Each playthrough will be a unique experience that can always be further perfected!

On your quest for vengeance, you'll have to overcome Bosses and Mini-Bosses that will challenge your skills in different ways!

FEATURES

  • Up to 4-Player Local Co-Op and Versus Modes!

  • Explore 7 lengthy stages spanning the world (and even further)!

  • Face multiple difficulties for those seeking more challenge!

  • Beat your high score in Arcade Mode!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Xcode. Targeting Apple Silicon with IL2CPP scripting backend requires macOS Catalina 10.15.4 and Xcode 12.2 or newer.

name: Underling Uprising

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later and Windows 10 SDK.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A modern Beat 'Em Up with inspirations from nostalgic '90s cartoons. Fight across the world as the Underlings, a group of scientifically enhanced experiments, each with their own unique powers. Take revenge on the mad scientist that created you!
